mapper.select: SELECT A.FORM_SEQ, A.CUST_ID, A.CUST_NAME, A.CUST_LEVEL_DIV, A.CUST_GUBUN_DIV, A.MANAGE_NO, A.BIRTH_DATE, A.PHONE, A.ZIP_CODE, A.ADDR1, A.ADDR2, A.DEPT_ID, A.DEPT_NAME, A.DEPT_DIV, A.OWNER_NAME, A.DEPT_PHONE, A.DEPT_ADDR, A.PRO_NAME, A.RELATION_DIV, A.PRO_BIRTH_DATE, A.PRO_PHONE, A.PRO_HP, A.PRO_ZIP_CODE, A.PRO_ADDR1, A.PRO_ADDR2, A.FROM_DATE, A.TO_DATE, A.WRITE_DAY, A.CALC_DAY, A.NOTI_DAY, A.PAY_DAY, A.PAY_METHOD, A.CONTRACT_DATE, A.WRITE_DATE, A.MEMBER_ID, A.MEMBER_NAME FROM FORM_CONTRACT A WHERE A.DEPT_ID LIKE #{deptId} AND A.CUST_ID = #{custId} ORDER BY A.WRITE_DATE DESC, A.FORM_SEQ DESC

SELECT A.FORM_SEQ, A.PLAN_SEQ, A.MON_YN, A.TUE_YN, A.WED_YN, A.THU_YN, A.FRI_YN, A.SAT_YN, A.SUN_YN, A.FROM_HOUR, A.FROM_MIN, A.TO_HOUR, A.TO_MIN, A.WEEK_YN, A.WEEK2_YN, A.MONTH_YN FROM FORM_CONTRACT_PLAN A WHERE A.FORM_SEQ = #{formSeq} ORDER BY A.PLAN_SEQ

SELECT DEPT_NAME, PHONE, OWNER_NAME, TRIM( CASE WHEN LENGTH(ZIP_CODE) > 0 THEN '(' || (CASE WHEN LENGTH(ZIP_CODE)=6 THEN SUBSTR(ZIP_CODE,1,3) || '-' || SUBSTR(ZIP_CODE,4,3) ELSE ZIP_CODE END) || ') ' ELSE '' END || ADDR1 || ' ' || ADDR2 ) AS ADDRESS FROM CODE_DEPT WHERE DEPT_ID = #{deptId}
SELECT B.PRO_NAME, B.PHONE, B.HP, B.ZIP_CODE, B.ADDR1, B.ADDR2 FROM CODE_CUST A LEFT JOIN CODE_CUSTPROTECTOR B ON A.CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID AND A.PRO_SEQ = B.PRO_SEQ WHERE A.CUST_ID = #{custId}
